trans-unit.source: Arranges and virtualizes content on a single line that is oriented either horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: 在水平或垂直的一行中排列并显示内容。

trans-unit.source: The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control.
trans-unit.target: 标准布局系统创建项容器，并计算每个项与列表控件关联的布局。

trans-unit.source: The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen.
trans-unit.target: 单词"虚拟化"是指一种技术所依据的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素生成从更大的多个数据项基于屏幕上所显示的项。

trans-unit.source: Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application.
trans-unit.target: 生成多个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素只有少数元素可能在屏幕上时可以对你的应用程序的性能产生负面影响。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> calculates the number of visible items and works with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator> from an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> (such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>计算可见项的数目，并处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator>从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>(如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) 创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]只为可见项的元素。

trans-unit.source: Virtualization in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> only occurs when the items control contained in the panel creates its own item containers.
trans-unit.target: 中的虚拟化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>面板中包含的项控件创建其自己的项容器时，才发生。

trans-unit.source: You can ensure this happens by using data binding.
trans-unit.target: 你可以确保通过使用数据绑定将发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: In scenarios where item containers are created and added to the items control, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> offers no performance advantage over a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 在其中创建和添加到项控件项容器的情况下<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>通过提供任何性能优势<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> is the default items host for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> 是的默认项宿主<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>元素。

trans-unit.source: By default, the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，`VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing`附加的属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: When the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is set to `false`, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> behaves the same as an ordinary <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 当`VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing`附加的属性设置为`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>行为与普通相同<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to bind to an XML data source and virtualize the items displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> element using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将绑定到 XML 数据源和虚拟化中显示的项<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>元素使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is explicitly set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，`VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing`附加的属性显式设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> and sets the `VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode` attached property to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationMode.Recycling>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>和设置`VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode`附加到属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationMode.Recycling>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the data used in the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示使用上一示例中的数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> that is listening for this event.
trans-unit.target: 侦听此事件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />。

trans-unit.source: The event handler that is to be added.
trans-unit.target: 将要添加的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for the <see langword="VirtualizingStackPanel.CleanUpVirtualizedItem" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 添加 <see langword="VirtualizingStackPanel.CleanUpVirtualizedItem" /> 附加事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control.
trans-unit.target: 标准布局系统创建项容器，并计算每个项与列表控件关联的布局。

trans-unit.source: The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen.
trans-unit.target: 单词"虚拟化"是指一种技术所依据的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素生成从更大的多个数据项基于屏幕上所显示的项。

trans-unit.source: Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application.
trans-unit.target: 生成多个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素只有少数元素可能在屏幕上时可以对你的应用程序的性能产生负面影响。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> calculates the number of visible items and works with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator> from an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> (such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>计算可见项的数目，并处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator>从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>(如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) 创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]只为可见项的元素。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that this element should use to arrange its child elements.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />，此元素应使用它来排列其子元素。

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 排列 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> 元素的内容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that represents the arranged size of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> element and its child elements.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />，表示此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> 元素及其子元素的排列大小。

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.ArrangeOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.MeasureOverride%2A> methods in a derived class for custom layout behavior.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.ArrangeOverride%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.MeasureOverride%2A>派生类中为自定义布局的行为的方法。

trans-unit.source: The position of the item to generate and make visible.
trans-unit.target: 要生成并使之可见的项的位置。

trans-unit.source: Generates the item at the specified index position and brings it into view.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引位置生成项并使其可见。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> position does not exist in the child collection.
trans-unit.target: 子集合中不存在 <paramref name="index" /> 位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> can virtualize items that are grouped or organized in a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> 能否虚拟化层次结构中分组或组织的项的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> can scroll in the horizontal dimension.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> 能否水平滚动。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if content can scroll in the horizontal dimension; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容可以水平滚动，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether content can scroll in the vertical dimension.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示内容能否垂直滚动。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if content can scroll in the vertical dimension; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容可以垂直滚动，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see langword="VirtualizingStackPanel.CleanUpVirtualizedItem" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see langword="VirtualizingStackPanel.CleanUpVirtualizedItem" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the vertical size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含盘区垂直大小的一个值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the vertical size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Double" />，表示此盘区的垂直大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0.0。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the horizontal size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含盘区水平大小的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the horizontal size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: 表示此盘区的水平大小的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0.0。

trans-unit.source: The element whose position to find.
trans-unit.target: 要查找位置的元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the specified item, relative to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定项相对于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> 的位置。

trans-unit.source: The position of the specified item, relative to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定项的位置，相对于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> has a vertical or horizontal orientation.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> 是水平方向还是垂直方向。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `true` because a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> must have either a vertical or horizontal orientation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回`true`因为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>必须具有垂直或水平方向。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值包含滚动内容的水平偏移量。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Double" />，它表示滚动内容的水平偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0.0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see langword="VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see langword="VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing" /> 附加属性。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content downward by one logical unit.
trans-unit.target: 将内容向下滚动一个逻辑单位。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method in a derived class to change how the stack panel scrolls content downward.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写此方法在派生类以更改堆叠面板滚动内容向下的方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can scroll content down by two units instead of one.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以内容向下滚动而不是一个两个单位。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content to the left by one logical unit.
trans-unit.target: 将内容向左滚动一个逻辑单位。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method in a derived class to change how the stack panel scrolls content downward.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写此方法在派生类以更改堆叠面板滚动内容向下的方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can scroll content down by two units instead of one.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以内容向下滚动而不是一个两个单位。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content to the right by one logical unit.
trans-unit.target: 将内容向右滚动一个逻辑单位。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method in a derived class to change how the stack panel scrolls content to the right.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写此方法在派生类以更改堆叠面板滚动到右侧的内容的方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can scroll content right by two units instead of one.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以滚动内容权限，而不是一个两个单位。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content upward by one logical unit.
trans-unit.target: 将内容向上滚动一个逻辑单位。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method in a derived class to change how the stack panel scrolls content upward.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写此方法在派生类以更改堆叠面板滚动内容向上的方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can scroll up two units instead of one.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以两个单位，而不是一个向上滚动。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that becomes visible.
trans-unit.target: 变为可见的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the coordinate space within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 内的坐标空间。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls to the specified coordinates and makes that portion of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> visible.
trans-unit.target: 滚动到指定坐标并使该 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 部分可见。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that is visible.
trans-unit.target: 可见的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />。

trans-unit.source: An upper limit <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that should not be exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 不能超过的上限 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: Measures the child elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> in anticipation of arranging them during the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> pass.
trans-unit.target: 测量 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> 的子元素，以便准备在 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> 处理过程中排列它们。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that represents the desired size of the element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />，表示元素的所需大小。

trans-unit.source: When scrolling, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> does not grow in layout size, but effectively adds its descendants on a z-plane, which is normally clipped by a parent element (typically a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter>) to the size of the stack.
trans-unit.target: 当滚动时，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>不会增加布局大小，但有效地将其子代添加 z 平面上，这通常由父元素裁剪 (通常<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter>) 到堆栈的大小。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically downward in response to a downward click of the mouse wheel button.
trans-unit.target: 向下逻辑滚动内容以响应鼠标滚轮按钮的向下单击操作。

trans-unit.source: You can override <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.MouseWheelDown%2A> in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the mouse wheel down action.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.MouseWheelDown%2A>更改堆栈面板响应鼠标滚轮下操作的方式派生的类中。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically to the left in response to a left click of the mouse wheel button.
trans-unit.target: 向左逻辑滚动内容以响应鼠标滚轮按钮的向左单击操作。

trans-unit.source: You can override <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.MouseWheelLeft%2A> in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the mouse wheel left action.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.MouseWheelLeft%2A>更改堆栈面板响应鼠标滚轮左操作的方式派生的类中。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically to the right in response to a right click of the mouse wheel button.
trans-unit.target: 向右逻辑滚动内容以响应鼠标滚轮按钮的右击操作。

trans-unit.source: You can override <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.MouseWheelRight%2A> in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the mouse wheel right action.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.MouseWheelRight%2A>更改堆栈面板响应鼠标滚轮右操作的方式派生的类中。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically upward in response to an upward click of the mouse wheel button.
trans-unit.target: 向上逻辑滚动内容以响应鼠标滚轮按钮的向上单击操作。

trans-unit.source: You can override <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.MouseWheelUp%2A> in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the mouse wheel up action.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.MouseWheelUp%2A>更改堆栈面板响应鼠标滚轮向上操作的方式派生的类中。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Data about the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的相关数据。

trans-unit.source: Called when an item that is hosted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> is re-virtualized.
trans-unit.target: 当重新虚拟化由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> 承载的项时调用。

trans-unit.source: The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control.
trans-unit.target: 标准布局系统创建项容器，并计算每个项与列表控件关联的布局。

trans-unit.source: The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen.
trans-unit.target: 单词"虚拟化"是指一种技术所依据的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素生成从更大的多个数据项基于屏幕上所显示的项。

trans-unit.source: Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application.
trans-unit.target: 生成多个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素只有少数元素可能在屏幕上时可以对你的应用程序的性能产生负面影响。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> calculates the number of visible items and works with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator> from an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> (such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>计算可见项的数目，并处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator>从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>(如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) 创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]只为可见项的元素。

trans-unit.source: Called when the collection of child elements is cleared by the base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 基类清除了子元素的集合时调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: 当与此 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Panel" /> 集合发生更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: The old offset of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 旧的视区偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The new offset of the viewport
trans-unit.target: 新的视区偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Called when the offset of the viewport changes as a user scrolls through content.
trans-unit.target: 当视区偏移量随用户滚动内容而发生变化时调用。

trans-unit.source: Use this method, in a derived class, to detect and respond to changes in the viewport location.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中，使用此方法，来检测和响应的更改视区位置。

trans-unit.source: The old size of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 以前的视区大小。

trans-unit.source: The new size of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 新的视区大小。

trans-unit.source: Called when the size of the viewport changes.
trans-unit.target: 在视区大小更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: Use this method, in a derived class, to detect and respond to changes in the viewport size.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中，使用此方法，以检测和响应中的视区大小的更改。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that describes the horizontal or vertical orientation of stacked content.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值描述堆叠内容的水平或垂直方向。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> of child content.
trans-unit.target: 子内容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.Orientation" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.Orientation" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content downward by one page.
trans-unit.target: 将内容向下滚动一页。

trans-unit.source: You can override <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.PageDown%2A> in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the page down action.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.PageDown%2A>更改堆栈面板响应 page down 操作的方式派生的类中。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content to the left by one page.
trans-unit.target: 将内容向左滚动一页。

trans-unit.source: You can override <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.PageLeft%2A> in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the page left action.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.PageLeft%2A>更改堆栈面板响应保留操作页的方式派生的类中。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content to the right by one page.
trans-unit.target: 将内容向右滚动一页。

trans-unit.source: You can override <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.PageRight%2A> in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the page right action.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.PageRight%2A>更改堆叠面板对页正确的操作的响应方式派生的类中。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content upward by one page.
trans-unit.target: 将内容向上滚动一页。

trans-unit.source: You can override <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.PageUp%2A> in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the page up action.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.PageUp%2A>更改堆栈面板响应 page up 操作的方式派生的类中。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> from which the handler is being removed.
trans-unit.target: 要从其中移除处理程序的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the event handler that is to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 指定要移除的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Removes an event handler for the <see langword="VirtualizingStackPanel.CleanUpVirtualizedItem" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 移除 <see langword="VirtualizingStackPanel.CleanUpVirtualizedItem" /> 附加事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control.
trans-unit.target: 标准布局系统创建项容器，并计算每个项与列表控件关联的布局。

trans-unit.source: The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen.
trans-unit.target: 单词"虚拟化"是指一种技术所依据的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素生成从更大的多个数据项基于屏幕上所显示的项。

trans-unit.source: Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application.
trans-unit.target: 生成多个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素只有少数元素可能在屏幕上时可以对你的应用程序的性能产生负面影响。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> calculates the number of visible items and works with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator> from an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> (such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>计算可见项的数目，并处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator>从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>(如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) 创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]只为可见项的元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that identifies the container that controls scrolling behavior in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值标识控制此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" /> 中的滚动行为的容器。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> that owns scrolling for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 拥有此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> 的滚动行为的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control is the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.ScrollOwner%2A>, physical scrolling is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>控件是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.ScrollOwner%2A>，将启用物理滚动。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> is the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.ScrollOwner%2A>, scrolling is logical by child element.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.ScrollOwner%2A>，滚动，则逻辑子元素。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.HorizontalOffset" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.HorizontalOffset" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.HorizontalOffset" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.HorizontalOffset" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.VerticalOffset" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.VerticalOffset" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.VerticalOffset" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.VerticalOffset" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the changed item is a direct child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />; <see langword="false" /> if the changed item is an indirect descendant of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已更改项此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />的子项，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果已更改项是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel" />的间接子代，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Contains data regarding the changed item.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关该更改项的数据。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a changed item in an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> affects the layout for this panel.
trans-unit.target: 返回指示更改的项是否在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 影响该面板的布局的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the changed item in an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> affects the layout for this panel; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 的更改的项目会影响该面板的布局，则为 <see langword="true" />否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含滚动内容的垂直偏移量的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> ，它表示滚动内容的垂直偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0.0。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the vertical size of the viewport of the content.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含内容视区垂直大小的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the vertical size of the viewport of the content.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Double" />表示内容视区的垂直大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0.0。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the horizontal size of the viewport of the content.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含内容视区的水平大小的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the vertical size of the viewport of the content.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Double" />表示内容视区的垂直大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0.0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see langword="VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see langword="VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode" /> 附加属性。
